# Face_Recognition
![](data:image/jpeg;base64,)

## Summary
Thanks to face_recognition library now we can create our own face recognition algorithm easily.

## Steps
- download pretrained model from face_recognition [here](https://face-recognition.readthedocs.io/en/latest/readme.html)
- Put your friend image in the images files and rename it for later.
- Change the name of image in python code by respect the order.

- Run the code and enjoy.

## notes
Next library sould be installed
- face_recognition
- openCV
- Numpy
